name: 10L Drop Pod
description: A steel pod with spread fins on top, resembling some sort of flower all together. Though a bit scorched, the goods inside should be no worse for wear, and can be freed with a twist of a valve.

name: Atmospheric Splash Pack
description: A very tough, stretchy, and insulating rubbery bag, resembling an IV pack. Used by BioCo when transporting liquids in hazardous enviroments, but also makes good thermos.
